overview: Brian Coatta is a co-founder of Carrier Mobile, an Ann Arbor-based startup developing software applications for the logistics industry. He and his team are working out of the University of Michigan’s TechArb through sponsorship by RPM Venturesâ€™ RPM-10 internship program and the Center for Entrepreneurship. Carrier Mobile currently has funding through Spark, an Ann Arbor economic development organization. Brian is a final-year student in the undergraduate Industrial and Operations Engineering program at the University of Michigan, where he is also pursuing an additional certificate in entrepreneurship.
